info.name: Novilar Compact Mode
info.description: Reduces whitespace and header images for a less scroll-heavy Novilar experience. This style is a work in progress and will be improved up as time goes on. -To report any issues please see the forum thread
info.additionalInfo:
2020 Changelog:
-Pets now fit better on the screen
-Those few random divs that got shoved down are back where they belong

2019 Changelog:
-Site width now responsive, not fixed
-Reduced minimum size of various fixed-width divs to properly compensate for this

2018 Changelog:
-Fixed the offset error that caused the entire usable portion of the webpage to disappear.
-Highlighted images should now be visible in the inventory
